column4: So I am not allowed to chat thanks to spammers if I do not give my E-Mail address to Freenode. That's the same way the western governments react to terrorism. MORE CONTROL
complain in #freenode or #staff .. this channel does not care about your issues with registering
so you have just been trolling? because what of these things that mean trolling did occur in #freenode?
this is not #freenode. it is #ubuntu and you crying about not wanting to register has nothing to do with ubuntu support or the /topic here.
